articles.title: Who Is Nikhil Gupta, Man Charged In Failed Plot To Kill Khalistan Terrorist - NDTV
articles.description: Nikhil Gupta, an Indian national, has been charged by US federal prosecutors with conspiring with an Indian government official to assassinate Gurpatwant Singh Pannun, a Khalistani terrorist who holds American and Canadian citizenship, on US soil.
articles.content:
The US has welcomed India's efforts to probe the matter.

articles.title: Animal movie release and review live updates: Ranbir Kapoor film makes box office history in North America - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Animal movie review highlights: The film released in Hindi, Telugu, Tamil, Kannada and Malayalam. Animal's release clashed with Vicky Kaushal’s Sam Bahadur.
